name: BunnyCap
description:
BunnyCap ($BCAP) is a community-driven meme coin inspired by a cute bunny with a magic hat. With a supply of 500,000,000,000,000 tokens, BunnyCap brings fun, creativity, and opportunities to the global crypto community.

Tagline: "Hop into the future with BunnyCap"

Vision:
To build a fun, transparent, and community-based meme coin ecosystem.

Mission:
• Provide massive airdrops to grow a global community.
• Become an iconic meme coin on Solana with the unique branding of a bunny wearing a magic hat.
• Foster an active community through events, meme competitions, and creator collaborations.
• Ensure liquidity and a healthy ecosystem with a clear distribution system.
